name: Embed Code for WooCommerce
author: siddhu09rocks

sections.description:
If you want to embed tracking codes, analytics, scripts, pixels etc. on WooCommerce pages.

Embed Code for WooCommerce makes it easier then ever to configure. You can add WooCommerce page specific embed codes with the help of plugin settings.

Plugin Supports following WooCommerce Pages

  • WooCommerce Archive Pages ( Shop, Category, Tag )
  • Product Page
  • Cart Page
  • Checkout Page
  • Order Confirmation Page

It is designed to be user friendly, simple lightweight and easy to configure.

This plugin is absolutely, 100% free.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Where are Embed Code for WooCommerce settings?

You can find Woo Embed Code menu item in Admin area

Want to Embed code in the begining?

You can enabled that on plugin settings page ( checkbox just above save changes button ).

short_description: A lightweight plugin to embed tracking codes, scripts, pixels etc. on WooCommerce pages.
